channel.title: VirtualBox Guest Additions installation from CD
channel.description:
I have inserted the the Guest Additions CD Image to Whonix-Gateway by pressing host+D, then I noticed the system respond and I try to open the folder where the CD image is, Whonix Gateway returns an error message:
An error occurred while accessing VBOXADDITION the system responded: The requested operation has failed:Error mounting: mount exited with exit code 1: helper faled with: mount: mount point /mnt/cdrom0 does not exist

item.title: VirtualBox Guest Additions installation from CD
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
The /mnt folder doesn’t really matter or does it? You’re most welcome to fix this issue, I am out of ideas.

Read full topic
item.source: VirtualBox Guest Additions installation from CD

item.title: VirtualBox Guest Additions installation from CD
item.dc:creator: Cerberus
item.description:
Patrick:
  1. a known issue:
    https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download#Mounting_(CD/DVD)_Devices

Shouldn’t it read

sudo mkdir /mnt/cdrom0

rather than

sudo mkdir /mnt/cdrom

?

Read full topic
item.source: VirtualBox Guest Additions installation from CD

item.title: VirtualBox Guest Additions installation from CD
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Two things here.

  1. a known issue:
    https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Known_Issues#Mounting_.28CD_.2F_DVD.29_Devices

  2. why not use the simpler and tested instructions from https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox_Guest_Additions ?

Read full topic
